interestingFact: Earth is home to over 8 billion people and more than 195 recognized countries.
Pakistan is home to the world’s second-highest mountain, K2.
India is the world’s largest democracy.
The US has the world’s largest economy.
China has the world’s longest continuous civilization.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon rainforest, the largest in the world.
Germany is known as the birthplace of classical music with composers like Beethoven and Bach.
